reviewText: The movie is my all time favorite, however the copy I received wasn't in english and there was no conv
This is the best romantic film I have ever seen!!!  Even though it is over 30 years old, the imagery, music, & script cannot be beat!

The dvd was received on time and in good shape.  Unfortunately, the dvd would not play in any dvd player. It does have the code 2,4PAL on it which I understand means it is for foreign county viewing.  I would like it return it and get the same movie  but for the USA.  Please send me the address to return the DVD.  Thank you so much for your help.
